title: George Stephanopoulos
summary: George Robert Stephanopoulos (born February 10, 1961) is an American television host, political commentator, and former Democratic advisor.[1][2] Stephanopoulos currently is a coanchor with Robin Roberts and Michael Strahan on Good Morning America, and host of This Week, ABC's Sunday morning current events news program.[3][4] From 2014 to 2020 Stephanopoulos held the title as "Chief Anchor" of ABC News, demoted in 2021 to mornings only as David Muir began new duties covering breaking news in the evening hours and prime time.[5]
